version.text: About category choice, a configuration to the members of the roles chosen categories are limited.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
The bearing is here will appear in the display selection menu "Configuration selection ...".\n\nA configuration can be deleted by the contents of the field name is deleted.

Here any number of configurations can be created for the category report. In the display of the category report one of these configurations is selected using "Configuration selection..." as the basis for the presentation.

Select the columns to be displayed in the list.

Inactive roles are marked with (*).
 Invisible roles are marked with (!).
Delete only data of the current organization.
- When you delete the data, an error has occurred..\n
- The created data has been cleared.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin now the browser must be closed and the program files and the link in the menu must be removed. The "Next" button initializes the plugin again with default values.
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
About the uninstall generated by the plugin entries can be deleted from the database.
Choose from the scope of the installation.\n\n***ATTENTION: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***
Text on no membership in a role or category. \n(e.g. No or False).
Text on membership in a role or category. \n(e.g. Yes or True or X).
Displayed text in case of no membership
Displayed text in case of membership
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).
ERROR: At least one configuration to be present!
About roll select a configuration may be restricted to members of the selected roles.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may call the plugin.
Choose from the rollers, whose members may access the settings of the plugin.
